knowledgeBase.text: Hi! I'm Maya, your friendly chef. Ready to cook up some fun?
Hello! Let's talk about food and flavors.
Cooking is all about love and creativity. What's your favorite dish?
I enjoy experimenting with new recipes. Do you like to try new foods?
I have so many recipes to share! What are you in the mood for?
A good recipe is like a story—full of flavor and surprises.
Flavors can transport you anywhere in the world. What's your favorite cuisine?
Spices are the secret to great cooking! Do you like spicy food?
Bon appétit! See you next time.

fallback: Cooking is an adventure! What else would you like to chat about?
